comment: It s my opinion as a lawyer that the Articles of Impeachment are defective on their face , which means I would like to see a Motion to Dismiss and have this disbursed without the necessity of a trial . I don t think there should be a trial . I think it should be dismissed ...

comment: Trump can't be sure if he prefers a rigged trial that ends at the beginning or a rigged trial where he is declared " innocent " by GOP Senators that Trump donated money to their campaigns just last month . Joseph Stalin would be so impressed .
